solution.text:
The surface area of the box \(= 2 (_{k}_ \times _{l}_ + _{l}_ \times _{m}_ + _{k}_ \times _{m}_) = _{{2*((k*l)+(l*m)+(k*m))}}_ cm^2\)
Cost of painting the box = Rs. _{j}_ per \(cm^2\)
Therefore, total cost of painting the box = \(_{{2*((k*l)+(l*m)+(k*m))}}_ \times _{j}_\)
= Rs. _{{2*Decimal(str(j))*((k*l)+(l*m)+(k*m))}}_

content.text: Latika needs to paint a rectangular box from the outside. The cost of painting the box is Rs. _{j}_ per \(cm^2.\) If the dimensions of the box are \(_{k}_ cm \times _{l}_ cm \times _{m}_ cm\), what is the total cost of painting the box?
